column1: For the above-said reasons, this Court is of the view that the grounds of appeal
raised  by  the  Accused  are  without  merit.  We  see  no  reason  to  interfere  with  the
Judgement dated 20th of September 2019. The conviction and the sentence are affirmed,
and the Appeal is accordingly dismissed.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
